data.text: My child is happy at this school.
My child feels safe at this school.
My child’s school does its best to ensure that they reach their potential.
My child has SEND, and I believe they are being helped to succeed at this school.
My child’s school has high expectations for all its pupils.
There have been a high number of staff changes at my child’s school over the last year.
My child has the opportunity to explore extracurricular interests at this school.
My child’s school is helping them become a successful, rounded person.
My child’s school takes the need for good behaviour seriously.
I am confident that if my child was bullied, the school would stop it happening.
If I had a concern, the school would take it seriously.
The school updates me regularly about how my child is getting on.
My school makes me aware of what my child should be able to know and do at this stage.
I would recommend this school to another parent.
